item.title: 纽约市最有权势的首席执行官们如何看待佐赫兰-马姆达尼？
item.description:
与本市一位顶级权力经纪人的对话

【原文：

A chat with one of the city's top power brokers

】

item.title: 奇货可居：纽约市首席执行官对佐赫兰-马姆达尼的看法（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：纽约市首席执行官对佐赫兰-马姆达尼的看法（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: What NYC’s CEOs Think About Zohran Mamdani (Podcast)】

item.title: 德国在天然气价格大幅下跌后达到天然气储存里程碑
item.description: 与今年年初相比，德国天然气储存地的预订量急剧下降，当时德国的天然气库存处于三年来的最低水平，不寻常的市场结构导致加气无利可图。【原文：Traders have ramped up bookings at German natural gas storage sites, marking a sharp turnaround from earlier this year when the country exited winter with stockpiles at a three-year low and an unusual market structure made refills unprofitable.】

item.title: 为什么是投资矿业的时候了？
item.description:
在本期Merryn Talks Money节目中，我们的专家小组提出了在您的投资组合中增加贵金属和工业金属的理由。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, our panel makes the case for more precious and industrial metals in your portfolio.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称再次降息的门槛很高： Econostream
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，通胀率必须出现重大下行，才有理由再次降低借贷成本。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said there’d have to be a major downward shift in inflation to justify another reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 特朗普的美国铜关税--想法是什么，能否奏效？
item.description: 自 1 月份唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁要对作为电力网络、管道和工业机械重要组成部分的铜征收进口关税以来，美国铜价一路飙升。现在，铜关税的到来比几乎所有人预料的都要早，也比预料的都要高。【原文：Prices of copper in the US have surged since January, when President Donald Trump threatened to impose a tariff on imports of the metal that’s a vital component in power networks, plumbing and industrial machinery. Now the copper levy is arriving sooner, and higher, than almost anyone expected.】

item.title: 意大利天然气公司获得更多时间为 50 亿欧元的 2i 交易剥离资产
item.description: 意大利天然气公司（Italgas SpA）获准延长一个月，以剥离其 50 亿欧元（58 亿美元）收购 2i Rete Gas 公司的相关资产。【原文：Italgas SpA has been granted a one-month extension to divest assets tied to its €5 billion ($5.8 billion) takeover of 2i Rete Gas.】

item.title: 据说，OpenAI 的挑战者知普将考虑把 IPO 迁往香港
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国人工智能初创公司智璞正在考虑将其首次公开募股计划从中国大陆转移到香港，这将为香港的交易热潮再添一把火。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu is considering shifting its planned initial public offering to Hong Kong instead of mainland China, according to people with knowledge of the matter, adding to a dealmaking boom in the city.】

item.title: 西班牙旅游业增长放缓，不确定性因素影响旅游市场
item.description: 由于经济和地缘政治的不确定性影响了人们的旅游热情，欧洲第二大度假目的地西班牙的旅游业增长将低于此前的预期。【原文：Tourism in Spain, Europe’s second largest holiday destination, will grow less than previously expected as economic and geopolitical uncertainties weigh on appetite for travel.】

item.title: SAP 首席执行官称客户 "转型 "将推动增长直至 2030 年
item.description: SAP SE 首席执行官克里斯蒂安-克莱因（Christian Klein）表示，公司将通过为客户提供更多的洞察力和数据分析，在大多数客户将软件转移到云端后保持增长。【原文：SAP SE Chief Executive Officer Christian Klein said the company will maintain growth after most of its customers have moved their software to the cloud by offering clients additional insights and data analysis.】

item.title: 比亚迪、奇瑞等汽车制造商被发现申请额外补贴
item.description: 中国的行业监管机构发现，包括比亚迪股份有限公司和奇瑞汽车股份有限公司在内的汽车制造商在 2016 年开始的五年间申请了实际上不符合条件的电动汽车补贴。补贴金额超过 8.64 亿元人民币（1.21 亿美元）。【原文：China’s industry regulator found that carmakers including BYD Co. and Chery Automobile Co. claimed electric vehicle subsidies they didn’t actually qualify for during the five years that started in 2016. The amounts came to more than 864 million yuan ($121 million.)】

item.title: 菲律宾下令删除赌博广告以防上瘾
item.description: 菲律宾博彩监管机构已下令立即拆除全国各地的所有赌博广告牌和广告，因为人们担心这个东南亚国家的赌瘾会越来越大。【原文：The Philippines’ gaming regulator has ordered the immediate dismantling of all gambling billboards and advertisements across the country amid worries over a growing betting addiction in the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: Blackstone 的甜美出价获得仓储房地产投资信托基金董事会的支持
item.description: 英国房东 Warehouse REIT Plc 董事会建议股东接受 Blackstone Inc.【原文：The board of UK landlord Warehouse REIT Plc has recommended shareholders accept an increased offer for the company made by Blackstone Inc. that topped a proposal by rival Tritax Big Box REIT Plc.】

item.title: 英国经济连续两个月萎缩，斯塔默再遭打击
item.description: 由于企业和消费者难以从美国关税和一系列增税措施的打击中反弹，英国经济连续第二个月出现萎缩。【原文：The UK economy shrank for a second straight month as companies and consumers struggled to bounce back from the blow dealt by US tariffs and a raft of tax increases.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀进一步加速，增税压力增大
item.description: 罗马尼亚的通货膨胀在 6 月份继续加速，因为最近宣布的旨在削减欧盟最广泛预算赤字的增税措施将在未来几个月继续对物价造成压力。【原文：Romanian inflation continued to accelerate in June, as recently announced tax hikes designed to trim the European Union’s widest budget deficit will keep up the pressure on prices in coming months.】

item.title: 新兴亚洲外汇市场受特朗普全面关税威胁拖累
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将对美国大多数贸易伙伴征收 15%至 20%的全面关税，亚洲新兴货币随之下跌。【原文：Emerging Asian currencies fell after President Donald Trump signaled he is eyeing blanket tariffs of 15% to 20% on most of America’s trading partners.】

item.title: 市场为特朗普的关税政策壮胆，加剧了他将走得太远的担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普以创纪录的股票涨幅为由，威胁要将普遍关税基线提高一倍至 20%，以消除人们对这一举措将重创全球经济的担忧。尽管金融市场对这一消息几乎没有反应，但人们越来越担心，一场清算即将来临。【原文：President Donald Trump threatened to double the baseline universal tariff to 20%, citing record stock gains to dispel fears that such a move would hammer the global economy. Even as financial markets barely budged on the news, concerns are growing that a reckoning is coming.】

item.title: 马来西亚工业产值下滑加剧经济放缓迹象
item.description: 马来西亚工业生产连续第二个月增长速度低于预期，加剧了经济放缓的迹象，促使央行本周下调利率。【原文：Malaysia’s industrial production grew at a slower-than-expected pace for the second straight month, adding to signs of an economic slowdown that prompted the central bank to cut interest rates this week.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国经济五月份连续第二个月意外萎缩
马来西亚芯片企业因关税忧虑暂停投资计划
item.description: 马来西亚半导体行业协会会长 Wong Siew Hai 表示，马来西亚的芯片公司正在等待美国关税问题的明朗化，因此暂缓投资和扩张。【原文：Chip firms in Malaysia are holding back on investment and expansion as they await clarity on tariffs from the US, according to Malaysia Semiconductor Industry Association President Wong Siew Hai.】

item.title: 菲律宾矿商向印尼的镍发货量激增
item.description: 菲律宾一家矿业公司的负责人表示，预计今年从菲律宾运往印尼的镍矿石将激增，以满足受雅加达限制国内生产影响的中资炼油厂的需求。【原文：Nickel ore shipments to Indonesia from the Philippines are expected to surge this year to meet demand from Chinese-owned refineries affected by Jakarta’s curbs on domestic production, according to the head of a Philippine miner.】

item.title: NHK 称中日讨论加快解除牛肉出口禁令
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司（NHK）报道，中国国务院副总理何立峰与日本执政党的一位高级官员讨论了加快解除日本对华牛肉出口禁令的进程。【原文：Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng and a senior official in Japan’s ruling party discussed speeding up the process to lift a ban on Japan’s beef exports to China, according to the public broadcaster NHK.】

item.title: 随着炒作热潮的升温，《巫师》游戏制造商跻身欧洲最昂贵股票之列
item.description: 对一款遥遥无期的视频游戏上市的乐观情绪，使一家开发该游戏的波兰工作室成为欧洲估值最高的公司之一，甚至超过了国防和电气化等热门行业。【原文：Optimism over a distant video-game launch has turned a Polish studio developing the title into one of Europe’s most richly valued companies, topping even hot sectors such as defense and electrification by one measure.】

item.title: 降雨不足，西澳大利亚小麦产量将减少
item.description: 据一个行业组织发布的本年度首次预估数据显示，由于部分地区降雨不足，本季西澳大利亚州的小麦产量预计将下降。【原文：Western Australia’s wheat production is expected to decline this season following poor rainfall across some regions, according to an industry group, which issued its first estimates for the year.】

item.title: 卢特尼克和贝森特来访，日本赤泽面临不良影响风险
item.description: 日本最高关税谈判代表赤泽亮世未来几天可能会再次面临压力，因为他面临着错过与两位受托负责贸易谈判的美国重要官员在访问大阪时举行会谈的风险。【原文：Japan’s top tariff negotiator Ryosei Akazawa may come under renewed pressure in the coming days as he faces the risk of missing out on talks with the two key US officials entrusted with trade negotiations when they visit Osaka.】

item.title: 日产债券销售受益于 "流动性充裕 "的市场
item.description: 日产汽车公司的最新自救行动受益于美国债券市场的看涨，为其 45 亿美元的债券交易提供了充足资金，尽管对其财务健康状况的质疑仍挥之不去。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s latest move to rescue itself benefited from a bullish US bond market to fully fund its $4.5 billion bond deal, even as questions lingered about its financial health.】

item.title: 中国人民银行顾问敦促采取 2090 亿美元刺激措施应对美国关税
item.description: 包括一位中国央行顾问在内的学者表示，中国应增加多达 1.5 万亿元人民币（合 2,090 亿美元）的新刺激措施，以刺激消费支出并保持货币灵活性，从而应对美国关税对经济增长的拖累。【原文：China should add as much as 1.5 trillion yuan ($209 billion) in fresh stimulus to boost consumer spending and maintain currency flexibility to counter US tariffs’ drag on growth, academics including an adviser to the country’s central bank said.】

item.title: 对加密货币交易持乐观态度，中国券商股大涨
item.description: 中国券商股创下近九个月来的最大涨幅，原因是市场对更多公司可能获得加密货币交易牌照的乐观情绪不断升温。【原文：Chinese brokerage stocks posted their biggest jump in nearly nine months on growing optimism that more firms may get crypto-trading licenses.】

item.title: 简街禁令影响新交所市场估值和到期交易额
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度 HCL Technologies 和 Tech Mahindra 揭开 IT 行业前景的面纱
item.description: 印度软件领军企业 HCL Technologies Ltd. 和 Tech Mahindra Ltd. 将在下周公布财报，让人们一窥南亚科技和软件行业的未来。【原文：Indian software leaders HCL Technologies Ltd. and Tech Mahindra Ltd. will offer a peek into the South Asian tech and software sector’s future when reporting earnings next week.】
